channel.title: CVE Feed for Atlassian -- Crucible
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Atlassian -- Crucible

item.title: CVE-2020-4015|2024-08-04T07:52:20.704Z -- atlassian -- crucible
item.description: The /json/fe/activeUserFinder.do resource in Altassian Fisheye and Crucible before version 4.8.1 allows remote attackers to view user user email addresses via a information disclosure vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-4014|2024-08-04T07:52:20.578Z -- atlassian -- crucible
item.description: The /profile/deleteWatch.do resource in Atlassian Fisheye and Crucible before version 4.8.1 allows remote attackers to remove another user's watching settings for a repository via an improper authorization vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-4017|2024-08-04T07:52:20.678Z -- atlassian -- crucible
item.description: The /rest/jira-ril/1.0/jira-rest/applinks resource in the crucible-jira-ril plugin in Atlassian Fisheye and Crucible before version 4.8.1 allows remote attackers to get information about any configured Jira application links via an information disclosure vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-4016|2024-08-04T07:52:20.545Z -- atlassian -- crucible
item.description: The /plugins/servlet/jira-blockers/ resource in the crucible-jira-ril plugin in Atlassian Fisheye and Crucible before version 4.8.1 allows remote attackers to get the ID of configured Jira application links via an information disclosure vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-4023|2024-08-04T07:52:20.579Z -- atlassian -- crucible
item.description: The review coverage resource in Atlassian Fisheye and Crucible before version 4.8.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTML or Javascript via a cross site scripting (XSS) vulnerability through the committerFilter parameter.

item.title: CVE-2020-4013|2024-08-04T07:52:20.435Z -- atlassian -- crucible
item.description: The review resource in Atlassian Fisheye and Crucible before version 4.8.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTML or Javascript via a cross site scripting (XSS) vulnerability through the review objectives.

item.title: CVE-2020-4018|2024-08-04T07:52:20.588Z -- atlassian -- crucible
item.description: The setup resources in Atlassian Fisheye and Crucible before version 4.8.1 allows remote attackers to complete the setup process via a cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability.
